front.title: IEEE Guide for Testing Metal-Enclosed Switchgear Rated up to 38 kV for Internal Arcing Faults Corrigendum 1

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: metal-enclosed low-voltage power circuit breaker switchgear
front.abstract: This corrigendum corrects technical errors found in IEEE Std C37.20.7-2007 during use in laboratories concerning current values and arc initiation in low-voltage (LV) testing and supply frequency for all equipment.
